author: sgralla
title: smart contract tutoring
description: Les marchés du tutorat sont très inefficaces : Les étudiants paient une tonne, tandis que les tuteurs gardent peu.

f6_assessments.q0: Great Idea. Presented by an "expert" in the related field. A modest approach, starting out within a hugely impactful market for Cardano. Expandable far beyond academic subject. Online tutoring is already a proven market. This is a great twist.
f6_assessments.q1: Both a teacher and an online entrepreneur, the proposers knows his market, the economics  and his potential customer base. That he focuses on disintermediation as the primary strategy shows he has studied his market. High marks
f6_assessments.q2: Proof will come  as the platform moves into low gear then high gear. As  in all start up ventures, this one will probably be confronted with gaining customers. But no different> He could probably explain his marketing strategies. The ask is low risk for the community.

f6_assessments.q0:
Your Problem solution is directly in line with this Challenge.
"Smart contract tutoring reduces costs and unlocks the global market, increasing opportunities for students and tutors alike"
f6_assessments.q1: Your experience in Tutoring and already developed Tutoring website demonstrates your ability to get this done. Your timeline of 3 months may be impacted by engaging an appropriate Cardano Smart Contract / Wallet programmer. Volunteering your personal time helps to adapt to any cost overruns. Your Budget seems appropriate.
f6_assessments.q2: As a complete project this can be audited however it would have been better if you could have listed some Time Lines like, date to engage programmer, date to code smart wallet, date to connect to wallet, test, debug, implement.

f6_assessments.q0: Smart contract tutoring is a great idea. The project already has a functioning frontend that has to be connected to the Cardano backend. I would like to see a road map that shows the path to success over 90 days. If the proposal is successful, payments for tutoring would increase the utility of the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposal has links to the team leader history and experience. I would like to see the team expand on the go to market strategy for  the product in 90 days. I would like the team to expand on how backend architecture will tie in with the Cardano blockchain.
f6_assessments.q2: I would like the team to develop a clear roadmap with milestones that can be connected to KPIs. Furthermore, I would like to see the budget developed beyond a single line entry in order to track expenditure. As the proposal stands I believe it will be challenging to audit the project.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is a university professor who has provided full public credentials to check and validate online. The proposal has clearly explained and underpinned the issue that the tutoring services or businesses face the negative to the end-user or learners. It is a significant and practical problem and would be advantageous for cardinal ecosystem use at the back and to address the KYC, credit card matter, and taxation. The above are the positive impacts from the project; however, a very vital concern about the taxation because if the traditional businesses on the move in this direction, then there is no tax payment at all, so what about the welfare support for the disadvantages in the society all the essential infrastructure that require the taxpayer to support so the government can deliver the most need it project for humanity.
f6_assessments.q1: I believe the project can be deliverable on time with $10,000 request for three months due to the current setup website. The full potential input from the proposer and the funding will be going to the developer for a Cardano Plutus and smart contract integration.
f6_assessments.q2: I understand the proposal has the potential to be delivered on time; however, the proposal should provide how the public and the challenge team audit your project. And yes, I understand the proposal is looking for Plutus/PAB developer if the project is funded but should highlight how it will complete the first month, second and third month even though the information can be minor but should include.

f6_assessments.q0: I completely agree with this proposal with a smart contract tutoring solution that reduces costs and opens up a global market, increasing opportunities for both students and tutors. As I understand the scope of the contracts This smart coin use for your tutorchain. The highlight is cutting intermediaries and reducing costs for both tutors and students. It will be better when the proponent adds a reputable tutor's rating so that students can choose quality courses with confidence.
f6_assessments.q1: "The proponent only records the total amount of the proposal without detailing how to use it when hiring the development team. Functions and parameters as well as interfaces should be more descriptive to increase the success assessment of the project. The project also has some related content for example: ""Tutorchain.io - Catalyst use case"" was proposed in fund 6, the contents can be combined together for better development."
f6_assessments.q2: The proponent has not provided a clear roadmap with indicators to be achieved, which is important for CA assessment. What are the challenges that will be encountered? How will the upgrade changes be implemented?.

solution: Le tutorat par contrat intelligent réduit les coûts et débloque le marché mondial, multipliant les opportunités pour les étudiants et les tuteurs.
experience: Je suis professeur de physique et entrepreneur avec des compétences de développeur full stack.  Je dirige une entreprise de tutorat en ligne, Tutor Terrace.
